name: brave-search
description: MCP server for Brave Search API integration providing web search, local search, and search suggestions with privacy-focused results

tools.name: brave_web_search
tools.description: Perform a web search using Brave Search API. Returns web results with titles, URLs, descriptions, and optional snippets. Brave Search provides independent, privacy-respecting search results without filter bubbles. Supports various filters and parameters for refined searches.

count.description: Number of results to return (default: 10, max: 50)

freshness.description: Filter by time: 'pd' (past day), 'pw' (past week), 'pm' (past month), 'py' (past year)

tools.name: brave_local_search
tools.description: Search for local businesses and points of interest using Brave's local search API. Returns local results with addresses, ratings, phone numbers, and business hours. Useful for location-based queries.

query.description: Local search query (e.g., 'coffee shops near me', 'restaurants in Seattle')

count.description: Number of results to return (default: 5, max: 20)

tools.name: brave_news_search
tools.description: Search for recent news articles using Brave Search. Returns news results with headlines, publication dates, sources, and article summaries. Focuses on recent and newsworthy content.

count.description: Number of news articles to return (default: 10, max: 20)

tools.name: brave_image_search
tools.description: Search for images using Brave Search. Returns image results with URLs, thumbnails, dimensions, and source information. Useful for finding visual content.

count.description: Number of images to return (default: 20, max: 150)

color.description: Filter by color: 'color', 'black_white', or specific color names

tools.name: brave_video_search
tools.description: Search for videos using Brave Search. Returns video results with titles, URLs, thumbnails, duration, and source platforms. Aggregates from multiple video platforms.

count.description: Number of videos to return (default: 10, max: 20)

tools.name: brave_suggest
tools.description: Get search suggestions and autocomplete results for a query. Useful for helping users refine their searches or discovering related topics.

query.description: Partial search query to get suggestions for
